body:
I've long been wanting to build an app to watch 3D MKV files in VR without first re-encoding them into side-by-side. I might as well just do that in TheseusJA, and make it a stand-alone mod.

For proprietary content, I can use the same flagging as I will for the Jedi Academy assets.

Watch parties should be able to sync playback, and to pre-load or stream the video, if copyright permits.
title: video playback
